properties.information:
Ottoman Ramadan at DoubleTree


			20% OFF 5 Uber Taxi Rides. Download Uber Mobile application and use promocode:EVENTSDOHA20 *Offer for first time riders with Uber
			
During the month of Ramadan, the L2 Restaurant will get this special Arabic touch – a hint of tradition infused by Turkish dishes finished off with the tales of the Ottoman Empire. There is a small story behind every dish on the menu. The most famous one is about “Hünkar Beğendi” – a dish out of 100 chosen by the Sultan himself several decades ago. Culinary excellence with more than 70 Ottoman dishes will be provided by the best chef that Turkey has to offer: Chef Samil – all the way from Izmir. He is the master of Ottoman dishes, simple in design but amazing in taste. Enjoy Iftar for QAR155 per person.

2017-05-28
visitor

properties.information:
#I AM EVO SUMMER CAMP



			20% OFF 5 Uber Taxi Rides. Download Uber Mobile application and use promocode:EVENTSDOHA20 *Offer for first time riders with Uber
			

Our #IamEvo Camps are designed to challenge young athletes to progressively develop their skills, performance and confidence. The courses are structured to meet the needs of all young players, to have fun, learn new skills and meet new friends in a safe and friendly environment. Members have a choice of venue, with camps held at Doha College Al Waab and Doha College West Bay.


Our camps are open to boys and girls aged 4-16 years and run from 8 am to 1 pm daily at each site.





Registration Now Open


Non-Members please click here – https://www.evopg.com/clubsys/register/
Members, please click here – https://www.evopg.com/clubsys/members/





2017-05-22
evosportsqatar
